abstract: Bits blog; Salesforce.com announces it will use Amazon Web Services to expand its operations in Canada and Australia; deal is valued at around $400 million.

headline.print_headline: Salesforce to Use Amazon’s Cloud to Expand
headline.main: Salesforce to Use Amazon’s Cloud to Expand in Canada and Australia

snippet: Salesforce, itself a cloud-computing company, will use Amazon Web Services to grow more rapidly in a deal valued at $400 million.
lead_paragraph: Salesforce, itself a cloud-computing company, will use Amazon Web Services to grow more rapidly in a deal valued at $400 million.
